title: IIFT Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 03 Corporate Relations Career Coordinator Posts
description: The Indian Institute of Foreign Trade (IIFT) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 03 Corporate Relations Career Coordinator Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBA, PGDM, or Post-graduation can apply for the IIFT Notification 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit,...
